nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 4 is the fourth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published by Marvel Comics on August 19, 2020. It features the story "Galaxy's Deadliest Part 4: Hunter's Mutiny," in which bounty hunters Beilert Valance and T'onga find their old mentor, Nakano Lash.

THE SINS THAT CAN'T BE ABSOLVED! With a blaster aimed at this [sic] back, cyborg bounty hunter VALANCE closes in on NAKANO LASH, the mentor who abandoned him many years ago. But what is the secret that Lash has been hiding ever since that fateful, doomed mission—one that led her to betray her entire crew? Those answers may die with her if a vengeful BOBA FETT gets to her first.
